revtext: Luckily found this place , service was too good , they have so many collections for each one’s choice , Ayesha , oh my god she is so sweet and friendly and suggests us what suits us . Thanks to wig-O-mania😊
revreply: Thank you so much for your kind words and appreciation. It motivates us all the more to make a difference in people\'s lives with our products and service. Aysha is indeed our \"Kohinoor diamond\" and stretches herself to ensure each client is offered the best possible product to suit her requirements
